name: NeedSomeSpace
description:
Game made for DiscordJam#2.

Use the available space around you as much as you can to dodge incoming enemies. But if you use it too much, you will die. Good luck!

Use Arrow or WASD to move.
Use Space to increase the available area.

Credits

Music : Chiptune Frontiers from  teknoaxe.com

Font : Pixel FJVerdana 12pt Font from 1001fonts.com
